resources.string: How many miles will you be travelling?
What is your preference for vehicle?

Welcome to the Uber Fare App! All Uber rides have an initial fee of $3.00. For ever mile you travel, an additional $3.25 is added to your bill. If you choose to ride in a smart car, there will be a one-time fee of $2, and for a minivan, there will be a one-time fee of $5.
Here is a summary of the selections you made!
Your Uber ride has been requested!
